resources.string: This system will be started on system boot.

MutedByPlugOut is a audio control system. If the plug of headphone is unplugged suddenly or Bluetooth headphone connection is lost, this system will set to mute. \nIf you want to enable MutedByPlugOut, please select [Enable]. If you use Bluetooth headphone at system starting time, Bluetooth headphone connection will be reconnecting.\nIf wish to start MutedByPlugOut on Android system boot, please select [This system will be started on system boot.].
Only available when the silent mode
